title.narrative: IR 2.7 ACCESS

description.narrative: IR 2.7 By the end of 2014, 3,900,000 children and 30,000 adolescents who are internally displaced and/or out of school have equitable access to formal / non-formal education opportunities., which contributes to Early Learning, Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: Equitable access to quality basic education improved and drop out mitigated, particularly for vulnerable children affected by the crisis (3-19 years old) affected by the crisis.
